meanings.definition: A condition in which small, bulging pouches develop in the digestive tract.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother was diagnosed with diverticulosis after experiencing stomach discomfort.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that diverticulosis can be managed with dietary changes.
meanings.sent3: When the diverticulosis acted up, it felt like a tiny party was happening in my belly.
meanings.sent4: Her digestive tract resembled a garden full of diverticulosis pouches waiting to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The image of diverticulosis pouches in the digestive tract stuck in my mind like little balloons.

meanings.definition: The presence of diverticula in the colon, often causing symptoms such as abdominal pain and changes in bowel habits.
meanings.sent1: After the test results, the doctor confirmed the diverticulosis in his colon.
meanings.sent2: She experienced severe abdominal pain due to diverticulosis in her colon.
meanings.sent3: The diverticulosis in his colon seemed to be throwing a party with all the discomfort it caused.
meanings.sent4: Her colon felt like a maze with diverticulosis diverting the normal flow of things.
meanings.sent5: The presence of diverticulosis in his colon was as noticeable as a bright light in a dark room.
